x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: SSO Identity Providers

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_f6d4c3de1be770507798a9b7624bcbb0
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><description>SSO Identify Provider</description><name>SSO Identity Providers</name><order>200</order><probe_type display_value="Mobile">e9dc377c1b681510ae5b21b5ec4bcb49</probe_type><remediation/><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();


var gr = new GlideRecord('sso_properties');
gr.addQuery('active', 'true');
//gr.addQuery('defult', 'true');
gr.query();

util.handleOutput('SSO Indentity Providers', 'information' , false);

if (gr.hasNext()) {

    while (gr.next()) {

		util.handleOutput('SSO Identity Provider - name: ' + gr.name + ', default: ' + gr['default'] +', can auto redirect: ' + gr.is_primary, 'information' , true);
       
      

    }
}
else
	{
		util.handleOutput('You do not have any active SSO properties. An active SSO property is needed for SSO login functionality','error', true);
		
		
	}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Anthony.Santos@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-03 13:25:21</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>f6d4c3de1be770507798a9b7624bcbb0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SSO Identity Providers</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_f6d4c3de1be770507798a9b7624bcbb0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Michael.Piazza@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-15 17:46:45</sys_updated_on></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
